availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Virgil Porter Addington (Ohio County, Kentucky, merchant and tailor.)

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, tailor. Kentucky native. Son of Henry Addington and Mary Addington. Married to Dorcas Anne Barnes Addington in Ohio County, Kentucky, in December 1855. Father of Lelia Addington Fogle. Tailor in Ohio County in 1850. Tailor in Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, District 1, p. 46A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Hartford, p. 788.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Hartford, p. 503B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 11072.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Ohio County Marriages, Film 000494956.
"Virgil P. Addington," The Hartford Herald (Hartford, KY), September 5, 1883, p. 3.
"Virgil Porter Addington (1833-1883)," Find A Grave, Memorial 52141247, accessed June 7, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/52141247.
